title: R&D Team Lead - Software Development
description:
About the Company Software House Description

**R\\&D Team Lead \\- Software Development** 

**About the Client:** 

Komatsu Pakistan Soft is a fully owned subsidiary of Komatsu Limited Japan, and we are a part of Komatsu Group of Companies. Komatsu Pakistan Soft (Pvt.) Limited is into operation since 1999\\. We excel in providing enterprise software application solutions, IT consultancy and outsourcing services. Our vision, utter commitment, sheer dedication, unmatched teamwork and customer\\-centric approach have helped us evolve into a forerunner of innovation and ingenuity within Komatsu group as well as across the global IT industry.

**Job Description**

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced individual to join our software development team as an R\\&D Team Lead. He/she will be responsible for leading our research and development initiatives, driving innovation, and proactively leading a team of software engineers. This role requires strong technical expertise, critical thinking abilities, and the capacity to develop research based effective solutions. This lead role is vital in shaping our company's future through research, innovation, and development of cutting\\-edge software solutions.

**Your Impactful Goals Will Include:**

**R\\&D Leadership:**

· Lead and oversee the company's research and development efforts, aligning with the organization's strategic goals and objectives.

· Foster a culture of innovation and critical thinking within the R\\&D team, encouraging creative problem\\- solving and exploration of new technologies.

· Collaborate closely with managers and engineers to understand business requirements and drive research\\-based solutions.

· Conduct thorough research and analysis to identify opportunities for innovation solutions based on emerging technologies.

**Team Management and Development:**

· Lead and manage a team of software engineers, providing guidance, support, and mentorship.

· Facilitate an environment that promotes collaboration, knowledge sharing, and continuous learning through R\\&D.

· Set clear expectations; assign tasks, monitor, and report progress to ensure timely and high\\-quality delivery.

**Technical Expertise and Solution Development:**

· Utilize strong technical background to provide technical leadership and guidance to the R\\&D team.

· Drive the design, development, and implementation of cutting\\-edge software systems and architectures.

· Stay up to date with the latest advancements in software development, research methodologies, and emerging technologies.

**Collaboration and Communication:**

· Communicate and collaborate closely with management to align R\\&D efforts with defined business objectives.

· Providing regular updates on R\\&D initiatives, progress, and challenges with internal and external stakeholders for knowledge sharing.

· Proactively coordinate with solutions teams and initiate R\\&D for any required functionalities, features, technologies and platform upgrades.

· Strong technical background with expertise in modern software development languages, frameworks, and tools.

· Proven experience in leading and managing software development teams.

· Excellent critical thinking and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to understand complex requirements and develop effective solutions.

· Strong research and analysis expertise, with the ability to identify and evaluate emerging technologies and trends.

· Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies and an iterative development process.

· Proficiency in cloud technologies and services, preferably with experience in Azure.

· Ability to thrive in a fast\\-paced, dynamic work environment and manage multiple priorities

**This position demands:**

· 8\\-12 years of experience as in total.

· 5 years of experience in a team lead or managerial role

· Knowledge of .NET framework and related technologies

· Hands\\-on experience with system design and architecture

· Hands\\-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

· Knowledge of AI, ML, LLM

· Experience with Microservices \\& Containers

· Experience with Agile/Scrum Methodologies

· Knowledge of latest industry trends, ability to be innovative with problem\\-solving

· Experience with Power BI

· Dashboards \\& Reports Development

· DWH Knowledge

**Skills Required:**

· Project Development

· Power Query

· Power BI

· Microsoft Office Suite (Advance Excel, Visio)

· Dashboards \\& Reports Development

· DWH Knowledge

**Industry**

· Information Technology

**Employment Type** 

· This is a full\\-time on\\-site permanent role, 5 days a week

**Job Level** 

· This is a Senior Level Role with 8\\-12 years of experience

**Education**

· BS (CS) / BS (IT) / BS (SE)

**Location**

· Onsite \\- G\\-8 Markaz Islamabad

**Experience** 

· 8\\-12 years of experience

**Timings**

· 9 AM to 5:45 PM / 5 days on\\-site role

title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**DynamoLogic Solutions** is looking for a Software Quality Assurance Engineer for a hybrid and full\\-time position to develop and execute web and software testing in order to ensure product quality.

**Responsibilities**

* Review requirements specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
* Create detailed, comprehensive and well\\-structured test plans and test cases
* Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
* Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
* Prioritize test cases to ensure the highest risk and most important test cases are executed first.
* Lead a team of developers and collaborate with other teams to deliver the projects timely.

**Requirements**

* BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
* 1\\+ years of experience in software quality assurance
* Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
* Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
* Ability to work independently with little direction
* Hands\\-on experience with both white box and black box testing
* Hands\\-on experience with WordPress or CRM testing
* Excellent verbal \\& written communication skills
* Knowledge in PHP, MySQL and JavaScript will be a big plus.
* Client handling and leadership skills to maintain and streamline the projects

**Full\\-time and Hybrid**

title: IBM HACP
description:
**IBM HACP**

Job Title: Software Engineer – IBM Distributed Software (IBM Host Access Client Package)

Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Software Engineer with expertise in IBM Distributed Software, particularly focusing on the IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP). In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing software solutions that leverage IBM HACP for seamless integration and management of host\\-based applications and systems. You will play a crucial role in improving access to mainframe and midrange systems, enhancing productivity and operational efficiency.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Design and Development:**

* Develop and maintain software solutions that integrate with IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP) to enhance host\\-based application access and management.
* Implement features and functionalities using IBM HACP components, including IBM Personal Communications and IBM i Access Client Solutions, to support various business needs.

**IBM HACP Management:**

* Configure and manage IBM Host Access Client Package environments, ensuring proper integration with host systems such as IBM mainframes and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\).
* Develop and implement solutions for secure and efficient access to host applications and data.

**Integration and Optimization:**

* Integrate IBM HACP with existing enterprise systems to facilitate smooth interactions between host and client applications.
* Optimize performance and reliability of host access solutions, addressing issues related to connectivity, security, and user experience.

**Technical Support and Troubleshooting:**

* Provide technical support for issues related to IBM Host Access Client Package, including diagnosing problems, debugging, and implementing fixes.
* Collaborate with support teams and stakeholders to resolve technical challenges and improve system stability.

**Documentation and Reporting:**

* Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for IBM HACP configurations, integration procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
* Prepare and present regular reports on system performance, project progress, and key metrics to stakeholders.

**Collaboration and Continuous Improvement:**

* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including system administrators, business analysts, and IT support, to gather requirements and deliver effective solutions.
* Stay current with industry trends and advancements in host access technologies and distributed systems. Propose and implement improvements to enhance system capabilities and user experience.

**• Incident and Service Management:**

* Understand and adhere to SLA and infrastructure policies, managing incidents and service requests efficiently.
* Handle P1 and P2 incidents, providing on\\-call support as required.
* Upgrade or migrate systems and perform interim or fixpack installations as needed.
* Understand and address security vulnerabilities by reading and interpreting security bulletins.

**Qualifications:**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field. Advanced degrees or relevant certifications (e.g., IBM Certified Specialist) are a plus.
* **Experience:** Minimum of 2 years of experience working with IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP) and related distributed software solutions. Proven experience in integrating and managing host\\-based applications is required.

**Technical Skills:**

* Proficiency with IBM Host Access Client Package components, including IBM Personal Communications and IBM i Access Client Solutions.
* Strong understanding of mainframe and midrange systems, including IBM z/OS and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\).
* Experience with network protocols and security measures for host access.
* Familiarity with scripting languages (e.g., Python, Shell) for automation and process optimization.
* Knowledge of distributed computing principles and related technologies.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: Rs500,000\\.00 \\- Rs745,044\\.00 per month

Experience:

* IBM z/OS and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\): 3 years (Preferred)
* Python, Shell: 3 years (Preferred)
* IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP): 3 years (Required)
* IBM Certified Specialist: 3 years (Required)
* IBM Personal Communications: 4 years (Preferred)
* IBM i Access Client Solutions.: 3 years (Preferred)

title: Trainee Embedded Systems Engineer
description:
Taraz Technologies has been providing research\\-oriented power electronics solutions to customers in more than 45 countries. Founded in 2012, Taraz was nominated among Pakistan's top most innovative technology startups. Our manufacturing and R\\&D facilities are located in Islamabad, Pakistan. Additionally, we've established a new manufacturing facility in Bursa, Turkey, to cater the growing demand for our innovative products.

**About the Role**

Are you passionate about solving complex problems in embedded systems? At Taraz Technologies, we are building cutting\\-edge power electronics and embedded solutions, and we’re looking for a talented R\\&D Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will work on designing, developing, and testing firmware that powers our advanced devices.

**What You'll Do:**

* Develop and debug firmware for microcontroller and FPGA\\-based systems.
* Implement communication protocols like SPI, UART, Ethernet, and USB for diagnostics and interfacing.
* Design control algorithms for DC and AC motors and implement them on microcontrollers.
* Collaborate with hardware and software teams to ensure seamless integration.
* Test and validate system performance to meet safety and quality standards.
* Stay updated on emerging technologies to drive innovation and improve efficiency.

**What We're Looking For:**

* A passion for embedded software development and problem\\-solving.
* Strong skills in C/C\\+\\+ programming with an emphasis on code optimization.
* Familiarity with microcontroller peripherals and understanding of hardware schematics.
* A proactive approach to learning and implementing new technologies.
* Strong teamwork and communication skills.

**Bonus Points If You Have:**

* Experience with ARM architecture and programming.
* Familiarity with Linux\\-based systems and GUI development.
* A background in ***Mechatronics Engineering*** or similar fields.

**Location: Bahria Town Phase 7, Rawalpindi.**

**Benefits:**

* USD pegged Competitive salary.
* Medical, housing and transportation allowances.
* Positive and inclusive work environment.
* Performance based career progression in a high growth tech company.

**Why work with us:**

We at Taraz Technologies believe that work is part of life; therefore, the people around us matter most. The culture of Taraz revolves around equality, friendship, and teamwork which empowers us to pursue our dreams and reach our goals. If you want to live a purpose\\-oriented life with nice people around you, then you should join us.

**Hiring Procedure:**

* CV shortlisting
* Initial interview
* IQ/Personality Assessment Tests
* Final interview
* Background Check
* Joining

description:

This role will manage various development, test, staging, and demo environments (code deployment, backups, data refreshes), as well as deploy and manage software, while leveraging as much automation as possible. He/She will be responsible for continually advancing the technology in a collaborative and creative agile environment, using many of the latest technologies and industry best practices, and finding better and more efficient ways of delivering solutions that meet business objectives. The DevOps Engineer oversees the code releases, combining an understanding of both engineering and coding. From creating and implementing systems software to analyzing data to improve existing ones, a DevOps Engineer increases productivity in the workplace. They understand the software development lifecycle and have a clear understanding of various automation tools for developing digital pipelines (CI/ CD pipelines).

**Education \\& Professional Qualification:**

* Degree(s)/Major(s): Bachelors or Masters in a relevant field from a reputed local/foreign University.

**Experience:**

**Responsibilities:**

* Adopt engineering best practices to deliver higher quality and scalable solutions.
* Follow documented standards and best practices.

* Implementing containerized workflows in customer environments using technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab, Ansible, Terraform, Istio, and other open\\-source solutions.
* Design, develop, document and implement complex environments for our business partners, vendors and teams.
* Build innovative automated solutions to migrate legacy systems and processes to the cloud.
* Develop and document standards and best practices, and mentor junior engineers.
* Resolve complex issues in creative and effective ways, adapted to each customer's needs.
* Provision applications in virtualized or container based platforms on Linux\\\\Windows systems.
* Integrate Systems including SQL, Messaging tools and Application code with operating systems and infrastructure.
* Interpret complex issues and clearly communicate them to others.
* Stay abreast of existing and emerging DevOps technologies and tools.
* Monitor official builds and drives infrastructure issues to resolution.
* Participate in release processes and contribute to tooling improvement.

Requirements

* Linux's administration skills, including software packaging, distribution, and configuration.
* **Experienced with a range of Git\\-based solutions (GitHub, GitLab), Terraform, Helm Charts, as well as config management tools like Ansible.**
* Understanding of networking fundamentals (IP, TCP, UDP, load balancing) including Linux network configuration with major distributions, Debian, RHEL
* Experience with IaaS, PaaS, and cloud technologies.
* Experience with distributed application concepts and DevOps tools
* Excellent writing and communication skills
* Demonstrable troubleshooting and debugging ability

Benefits

* EOBI
* Competitive Salary
* Medical Health Insurance
* Annual Leaves
* Casual leaves
* Sick Leaves
* Bereavement Leaves
* Marriage Leaves
* Paternity Leaves
* Maternity Leaves

At IKONIC, we believe in providing development opportunities to all its employees which is why our job comes with a variety of challenging assessments meant to catapult your career to the next level. This is made evident with our offerings such as:'

* A growth mindset through the help of experienced and helpful **Mentors**. Ikonic is made up of passionate individuals who aim to support each other in their training as well as day\\-to\\-day tasks.

* **Market Competitive Compensation** based upon your professional qualifications and skill set.
* As an **Equal employment opportunity** provider. All employment\\-associated decisions are based on an individual's merit.

**Note:** Above goals and job descriptions are indicative and subject to change.

title: QA Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Quality Assurance (QA) engineer to develop and execute exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality.

QA engineer responsibilities include designing and implementing tests, debugging, and defining corrective actions. You will also review system requirements and track quality assurance metrics (e.g., defect densities and open defect counts.)

Ultimately, you should monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.

**Responsibilities**

* Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
* Create detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases
* Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
* Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open\\-source tools
* Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
* Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
* Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs
* Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
* Monitor debugging process results
* Investigate the causes of non\\-conforming software and train users to implement solutions
* Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts
* Stay up to date with new testing tools and test strategies

**Requirements and skills**

* Proven work experience in software development
* Must have 2 years of official work experience in software quality assurance.
* Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
* Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases
* Hands\\-on experience with both white box and black box testing
* Hands\\-on experience with automated testing tools
* Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
* Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus
* BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: Rs30,000\\.00 \\- Rs40,000\\.00 per month

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* QA Engineer: 2 years (Preferred)

title: Lead Engineer/Architect (AI/ML)
description:
* **Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models** to address complex business challenges, such as predictive analytics, classification, recommendation systems, or natural language processing.

* Develop and maintain scalable, efficient, and optimized ML pipelines for model training, evaluation, and deployment.
* Conduct **data preprocessing**, feature engineering, and exploratory data analysis (EDA) to prepare datasets for model training.
* Implement and experiment with various **machine learning algorithms** (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning, deep learning, etc.) and evaluate model performance using metrics like accuracy, precision, recall, F1 score, etc.
* Work with large, complex datasets, and use advanced techniques in **data wrangling** and feature selection.
* **Monitor model performance** over time and improve the models through retraining and optimization.
* Implement **automated ML pipelines**, integrate version control, and manage model deployment using tools like **CI/CD**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**.
* Keep up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in machine learning and AI, and contribute to research and development initiatives.
* Collaborate with product and business teams to understand requirements, translate business needs into technical solutions, and deliver end\\-to\\-end machine learning solutions.

**Requirements:**

* **Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD** in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
* Proven experience (5\\+ years) in **machine learning** and **model development**.
* Strong programming skills in **Python** (preferred), **R**, or other relevant languages.
* Experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks such as **TensorFlow**, **Keras**, **PyTorch**, **scikit\\-learn**, or **XGBoost**.
* Solid understanding of **data structures**, **algorithms**, and software engineering best practices.
* Proficient in **data manipulation** and analysis using tools like **Pandas**, **NumPy**, and **SQL**.
* Experience with **cloud computing platforms** (AWS, GCP, Azure) and machine learning services (e.g., AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform).
* Strong knowledge of **statistical methods**, **probability theory**, and data analysis techniques.
* Familiarity with **model deployment** techniques and tools (Docker, Flask, FastAPI, TensorFlow Serving, etc.).

title: IBM Host Access Client Package
description:
**IBM HACP**

Job Title: Software Engineer – IBM Distributed Software (IBM Host Access Client Package)

Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Software Engineer with expertise in IBM Distributed Software, particularly focusing on the IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP). In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing software solutions that leverage IBM HACP for seamless integration and management of host\\-based applications and systems. You will play a crucial role in improving access to mainframe and midrange systems, enhancing productivity and operational efficiency.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Design and Development:**

* Develop and maintain software solutions that integrate with IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP) to enhance host\\-based application access and management.
* Implement features and functionalities using IBM HACP components, including IBM Personal Communications and IBM i Access Client Solutions, to support various business needs.

**IBM HACP Management:**

* Configure and manage IBM Host Access Client Package environments, ensuring proper integration with host systems such as IBM mainframes and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\).
* Develop and implement solutions for secure and efficient access to host applications and data.

**Integration and Optimization:**

* Integrate IBM HACP with existing enterprise systems to facilitate smooth interactions between host and client applications.
* Optimize performance and reliability of host access solutions, addressing issues related to connectivity, security, and user experience.

**Technical Support and Troubleshooting:**

* Provide technical support for issues related to IBM Host Access Client Package, including diagnosing problems, debugging, and implementing fixes.
* Collaborate with support teams and stakeholders to resolve technical challenges and improve system stability.

**Documentation and Reporting:**

* Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for IBM HACP configurations, integration procedures, and troubleshooting guides.
* Prepare and present regular reports on system performance, project progress, and key metrics to stakeholders.

**Collaboration and Continuous Improvement:**

* Work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including system administrators, business analysts, and IT support, to gather requirements and deliver effective solutions.
* Stay current with industry trends and advancements in host access technologies and distributed systems. Propose and implement improvements to enhance system capabilities and user experience.

**• Incident and Service Management:**

* Understand and adhere to SLA and infrastructure policies, managing incidents and service requests efficiently.
* Handle P1 and P2 incidents, providing on\\-call support as required.
* Upgrade or migrate systems and perform interim or fixpack installations as needed.
* Understand and address security vulnerabilities by reading and interpreting security bulletins.

**Qualifications:**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field. Advanced degrees or relevant certifications (e.g., IBM Certified Specialist) are a plus.
* **Experience:** Minimum of 2 years of experience working with IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP) and related distributed software solutions. Proven experience in integrating and managing host\\-based applications is required.

**Technical Skills:**

* Proficiency with IBM Host Access Client Package components, including IBM Personal Communications and IBM i Access Client Solutions.
* Strong understanding of mainframe and midrange systems, including IBM z/OS and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\).
* Experience with network protocols and security measures for host access.
* Familiarity with scripting languages (e.g., Python, Shell) for automation and process optimization.
* Knowledge of distributed computing principles and related technologies.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: Rs650,000\\.00 \\- Rs742,717\\.00 per month

Experience:

* IBM z/OS and IBM iSeries (AS/400\\): 3 years (Preferred)
* Python, Shell: 3 years (Preferred)
* IBM Host Access Client Package (HACP): 3 years (Required)
* IBM Certified Specialist: 3 years (Required)

title: Network Automation Engineer (Juniper Apstra)
description:
**Job Overview**

We are seeking a **Network Automation Engineer** with expertise in Juniper Apstra to design, deploy, and manage advanced data center networks using Juniper Apstra’s intent\\-based networking solutions. This role requires deep technical expertise in Apstra’s automation and analytics features, along with a strong understanding of modern data center protocols, architectures, and software\\-defined networking (SDN). The ideal candidate will play a key role in delivering scalable, reliable, and automated network solutions while providing technical leadership to teams and stakeholders.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design and implement data center network architectures leveraging Juniper Apstra, focusing on intent\\-based automation and assurance.
* Automate network provisioning, monitoring, and troubleshooting using Apstra’s APIs, templates, and SDKs.
* Configure and optimize data center protocols including BGP, EVPN\\-VXLAN, MPLS, OSPF, and Spanning Tree.
* Perform telemetry and analytics\\-based troubleshooting to identify and resolve network issues proactively.
* Develop and customize playbooks, templates, and workflows in Juniper Apstra for operational efficiency.
* Lead network integration projects, ensuring seamless interoperation between Apstra and other networking solutions.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define requirements, implement solutions, and deliver scalable outcomes.
* Provide technical leadership through documentation, best practices, and hands\\-on training sessions for teams and clients.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies in SDN, automation, and intent\\-based networking to drive innovation.

**Qualifications and Skills**

* Extensive hands\\-on experience with Juniper Apstra, including its design, deployment, and operational features.
* Deep knowledge of data center networking protocols such as BGP, EVPN\\-VXLAN, MPLS, OSPF, and ISIS.
* Strong understanding of software\\-defined networking (SDN), network automation, and telemetry\\-driven analytics.
* Proficiency in scripting and automation tools, including Python, Ansible, and Terraform.
* Experience with networking hardware and software, including Juniper devices and multi\\-vendor environments.
* Familiarity with cloud networking and hybrid data center environments (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, including root cause analysis for complex networking issues.
* Excellent communication skills for engaging with technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to create high\\-quality documentation, including design blueprints, implementation plans, and runbooks.

**Preferred Certifications**

* Juniper Certifications: JNCIA, JNCIS, JNCIP, or JNCIE.
* Relevant certifications like CCNP, CCIE, or cloud certifications (AWS, Azure).

title: MEP Engineer/BIM Modeler

**This is a Full\\-Night Shift (Office\\-based job) with hours from 8:00 p.m. to 5:00 a.m. (Note: Those who have any issues with the night shift should not apply.**

**IMPORTANT:** ***Local Candidates (Rawalpindi Division/Islamabad Only) are eligible to apply with Minimum of 4 years or more experience. Those who apply have to appear for in\\-person Interviews. from 8:00 p.m\\-12:00 a.m.*** 

**Those who join must sign a binding contract of 2 years minimum.**

**Disclaimer**: **By applying to this job you agree that you can be contacted in Office hours 8:00 p.m. \\-5:00 a.m. (NIGHT Shift Timings)**

As a SQA Engineer, you will be responsible for defining and adopting QA practices and planning and implementing tests. You are responsible for fully testing the product or system to ensure it functions properly and fits its purpose as well as meets the business needs.

**Job title**

**Senior SQA Engineer**

**Reports to**

**Project Manager, VP**

**Duties and Responsibilities**

* Test and prove that the software meets major architectural requirements.
* Able to write stories, and acceptance criteria, create test specifications, prepare bug reports, use bug summary reports, analyze bug reports statistically as required, and release the build.
* Work with the project/product team to understand requirements to design comprehensive test specifications and work with developers for unit testing.
* Execute the plans to thoroughly test all software releases under your charge, which can include mobile apps, client and server\\-side products, API platforms, and server infrastructure.
* Significantly increases our test automation coverage.
* Help define, implement, and drive adoption of QA best practices, proactively help improve processes, take up the role of an advocate for implementing technical best practices, and ensure the system's quality as a whole.

**QA Engineer Requirements and Qualifications**

* Graduate from any reputable university and possess a minimum 4\\-5 years of experience in QA Engineer, Software Testing, or a similar role.
* Hands\\-on experience in automated and manual testing in web and mobile apps.
* Experience working in an agile environment. Knowledge of agile methodology: Scrum, Kanban, TTD, and Lean.
* Hands\\-on experience in automated and manual testing and skilled in automated test tools for web, mobile, and server\\-side software. Experience in testing IOT systems is preferable.
* Deep understanding of QA and QC practices, including best practices, processes, all kinds of testing types, and application development life cycle.
* Excellent knowledge in testing skills, setting up test environments, designing test plans, test strategy, developing test cases/scenarios/usage cases, executing these cases, reopening and verifying bugs.
* Experience in creating test cases for functional. UAT, integration tests, Web APP, and mobile APP
* Skilled in methods/techniques of functional and non\\-functional testing such as Black/Whitebox, Integration, UAT, beta, SQL testing, API, smoke, sanity, regression, stress, load, performance, compatibility, compliance, UI/UX, and performance testing, etc.
* Should be skilled in using application development life cycle and management tools like JIRA, and testing and bug tracking tools like Zephyr, qTest, X\\-ray, Mantis, and automated tools like Selenium, Blaze Meter, and so on.

· Experience in release management and collaborative management and integration tools: Git, Bitbucket.

· Web Concepts: REST, JSON, OOP, Dependency Injection, SOAP.

* Understand the basic SQL/programming concepts.
* Experience in a wide range of Open Source Software, Mobile APPS, and location\\-based services
* Critical thinker, problem\\-solving skills, Good time\\-management skills, interpersonal skills, communication skills, need to be tactful and diplomatic to maintain a good working relationship with the software developers, ability to work under pressure and maintain deadline.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: Rs180,000\\.00 \\- Rs250,000\\.00 per month

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* SQA: 4 years (Required)

title: Software Engineer (Artificial Intelligence)
description:
**Company Overview:**

DreamBig Semiconductor is an emerging semiconductor startup committed to delivering innovative, low\\-cost, low\\-latency, and high\\-throughput solutions for AI, Datacenters, 5G, and Automotive markets. Headquartered in San Jose, CA, USA, we operate with offices across various regions globally to optimize R\\&D costs. Our company has forged strategic partnerships with global leaders in the ecosystem, enhancing our ability to deliver groundbreaking technologies.

At DreamBig Semiconductor, we are proud to have a team of top innovators with a proven track record of driving disruptive technologies in the semiconductor industry. We are passionate about transforming the future of semiconductor solutions and are on a mission to create high\\-performance products that power the most advanced technologies across multiple industries.

**Job Description:**  
We are seeking an experienced and innovative Software Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence to join our growing team. As a key member of our AI team, you will be responsible for developing and optimizing machine learning and deep learning models, particularly in the areas of large language models (LLMs) and GPU\\-based architectures. If you are passionate about AI technologies and want to work on cutting\\-edge solutions in a collaborative environment, we encourage you to apply!

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and optimize machine learning and deep learning models using frameworks like PyTorch, TensorFlow, and other AI tools.
* Work with the TVM compiler to enhance and optimize AI model performance.

* Apply advanced techniques for large language model (LLM) architecture design and optimization.
* Contribute to the understanding and improvement of AI models’ efficiency on GPU architectures.
* Write and maintain clean, efficient code in Python, C, and other languages.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute to their integration into the company’s solutions.

**Qualifications:**

* Strong knowledge of machine learning and deep learning, especially in large language model architectures.
* Expertise in Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and C programming.
* In\\-depth understanding of GPU architecture and optimization techniques.
* Experience in AI model adaptation (e.g., fine\\-tuning, RAG, LoRA) for specialized tasks is a plus.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a fast\\-paced, collaborative environment.
* Excellent communication and team collaboration skills.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary
* Annual Increments
* Comprehensive health insurance.
* Provident Fund
* Paid time off and holidays.
* Professional development opportunities.
* Friendly and supportive work environment.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer / Software Tester
description:
**About NCRi and CXAi:**



NCRi is a digitally powered, human delivered Global Customer Experience Management organization with multiple locations in Canada and abroad. We provide a wide range of business solutions to help businesses thrive. We are sought\\-after solutions partner for flawless AR, Omni Channel CX, Digital Transformation, and Smart Software solutions.

  

CXAi is an innovative technology company focused on transforming customer experiences through AI\\-powered solutions. We provide innovative tools to help businesses optimize their customer interactions and deliver personalized experiences at scale.

  

Both companies’ mission is to deliver elevated customer experiences to our clients, leveraging deep operational knowledge and process expertise, a strong and versatile technology stack, and a diverse geographic footprint. We focus on engaging early with our clients and leverage a consultative approach to deeply understand our clients’ brands, and design customized solutions to complex customer challenges.

 **Job Description**



As a QA Engineer at NCRi and CXAi, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our web and mobile platforms. This role requires strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to perform thorough testing across various scenarios and environments.  



  

**Core Responsibilities** (*include, but not limited too*)


* Collaborate with product managers, developers, and designers to understand project requirements and deliverables.
* Design, execute, and document test cases and test scenarios for both web and mobile platforms.
* Perform functional, regression, integration, usability, and exploratory testing.
* Identify, log, and track defects in the system, ensuring timely resolution with the development team.
* Conduct cross\\-browser and cross\\-device testing to ensure compatibility and responsiveness.
* Validate user interfaces and user experience to ensure seamless functionality and usability.
* Create and maintain comprehensive test documentation, including test plans, test reports, and bug logs.
* Participate in release management and post\\-release validation processes.
* Work closely with stakeholders to ensure all features meet quality expectations before release.

  


**Requirements**

  

* A bachelor's degree in industrial engineering or in a related engineering discipline is required.
* Licensing to practise as a professional engineer is preferred.
* 3\\-5 years of experience as QA Engineer or in a similar role
* Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools and processes
* Hands\\-on experience with automated testing tools
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process
* Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus
* Excellent communication and multitasking abilities.
* Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a fast\\-paced environment.

title: Tendering Engineer Civil
description:
**Role Overview**

The Tendering Engineer will be responsible for preparing, submitting, and managing tender proposals for both public and commercial projects. This includes analyzing tender requirements, ensuring compliance, and coordinating with relevant teams to deliver competitive and high\\-quality submissions. The ideal candidate will have expertise in tendering processes within the Gulf region, and proficiency in using tendering and project management software.

**Key ResponsibilitiesTender Preparation and Submission:**

* Analyze tender documents, project requirements, and client specifications for both public and commercial sectors.
* Develop and manage tender proposals, ensuring compliance with technical and commercial criteria.
* Coordinate with internal teams (estimation, procurement, legal, and finance) to gather accurate data for tenders.
* Prepare cost estimates, project timelines, and risk assessments as part of the tendering process.
* Conduct pre\\-tender meetings and site visits to ensure accurate project understanding.

**Commercial and Public Tendering Expertise:**

* Manage tendering processes for government projects, including adhering to public procurement laws and guidelines.
* Handle private and commercial tenders, ensuring competitive pricing and innovative solutions.
* Ensure accurate documentation for bid submissions, including compliance certificates, financial statements, and technical specifications.

**Gulf Market Knowledge:**

* Utilize experience in the Gulf region to identify market trends and strategies for competitive bidding.
* Liaise with Gulf\\-based stakeholders, vendors, and clients to facilitate tender processes.
* Adapt tendering strategies to meet Gulf\\-specific legal and regulatory requirements.

**Software and Tools Proficiency:**

* Use tendering and estimation software, including **Primavera P6, AutoCAD, Microsoft Project, and CostX**, for proposal preparation.
* Work with financial and project management tools to analyze project feasibility and profitability.
* Maintain databases and CRM tools for tender tracking and documentation.

**Post\\-Tender Activities:**

* Follow up with clients on submitted tenders and negotiate contracts.
* Review feedback from unsuccessful bids to identify areas of improvement.
* Assist in contract finalization, ensuring alignment with tender specifications.

**Cross\\-Functional Coordination:**

* Collaborate with design, engineering, and procurement teams to prepare accurate project deliverables.
* Communicate with external stakeholders, including consultants, contractors, and government bodies.
* Provide periodic updates and reports to senior management on tender progress and outcomes.
* **Educational Background:**
* Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.

**Experience:**

* Minimum **3 years of experience** in tendering and estimation, with a strong preference for Gulf market exposure.

**Key Skills:**

* In\\-depth knowledge of public procurement guidelines and commercial tendering standards.
* Expertise in preparing technical and financial proposals.
* Strong analytical and numerical skills for cost estimation and risk evaluation.
* Excellent communication and negotiation skills to engage with clients and stakeholders.
* Proficiency in tendering tools and software.

**Software Proficiency:**

* **Primavera P6** for project scheduling and management.
* **AutoCAD** for design and technical drawing reviews.
* **Microsoft Project** for planning and tracking deliverables.
* **CostX** for cost estimation and quantity take\\-offs.
* Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) for documentation and reporting.

title: Network Associate
description:
**Network Associate JD**

Network Associate is responsible for managing, maintaining, and troubleshooting the technical network infrastructure within a call center environment. This role focuses on ensuring consistent uptime and quality performance for all network components, supporting the functionality of call center applications, and assisting with network\\-related queries from call center staff.

**Key Responsibilities:**  
**Network Management:**

* Monitor call center network performance to identify and resolve issues promptly.
* Maintain call center infrastructure, including routers, switches, VoIP systems, and firewalls.
* Support and optimize call routing and IVR (Interactive Voice Response) systems.
* Ensure uptime and performance stability for both local and remote call center operations.

**Technical Support:**

* Provide level 1 and level 2 support for network\\-related incidents, troubleshooting connectivity issues affecting end\\-users.
* Assist in diagnosing hardware and software issues on networked devices within the call center environment.
* Coordinate with senior network engineers and vendors for escalated issues.

**Configuration \\& Maintenance:**

* Configure and deploy network equipment, including updating firmware and implementing network protocols.
* Manage network access and security protocols to safeguard data and ensure compliance.
* Conduct regular maintenance and audits to identify and rectify any potential vulnerabilities.

**Documentation \\& Reporting:**

* Maintain detailed records of network configurations, changes, and updates.
* Prepare reports on network status, downtime, and incident resolutions for managerial review.
* Document troubleshooting processes and provide clear steps for future reference.

**Training \\& Collaboration:**

* Work closely with call center staff, providing guidance and training on network\\-related tools and best practices.
* Collaborate with IT and network teams to implement upgrades and improve system efficiency.

**Qualifications:**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Network Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* **Experience:** 1\\-2 years of experience in network administration or a similar role; experience within a call center environment is an advantage.
* **Certifications:** CCNA, CompTIA Network\\+, or similar network\\-related certifications preferred.

**Key Skills:**  
**Technical Skills:**

* Proficient with network configuration, hardware troubleshooting, and networking protocols (TCP/IP, DHCP, DNS).
* Experience with network monitoring tools (e.g., SolarWinds, Nagios) and troubleshooting tools.
* Familiarity with VoIP technologies, call center applications, and IVR systems.

**Soft Skills:**

* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Effective communication skills, with the ability to explain technical information to non\\-technical staff.
* Ability to work both independently and as part of a team in a high\\-pressure environment.

**Other Skills:**

* Basic scripting knowledge (Python, Bash, or similar) is a plus.
* Willingness to work on\\-call shifts, as required for network support.

We are seeking an experienced Engineer to join our team and provide technical expertise for both pre and post\\-sales activities related to physical security systems. In this role, you will work closely with our sales team, project managers, and customers to design, implement, and support physical security solutions that meet the customer's needs and exceed their expectations. You will also provide technical support to our installation and service teams to ensure that systems are installed and maintained to our high standards for quality and customer service.

**Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with our sales team to identify customer requirements and provide technical guidance on the design of physical security systems.
* Design and configure physical security systems, including access control, video surveillance, and intrusion detection systems, to meet customer requirements and adhere to industry best practices.
* Provide technical guidance and support to our installation and service teams to ensure that systems are installed and maintained to our high standards for quality and customer service.
* Conduct site surveys and assessments to gather information on customer requirements and site\\-specific conditions.
* Develop project proposals and statements of work that accurately reflect the customer's needs and expectations.
* Conduct product demonstrations and presentations for customers and internal stakeholders.
* Provide technical support to our service team to troubleshoot and resolve issues with physical security systems.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with industry trends and best practices related to physical security systems.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field, or equivalent experience.
* 2\\+ years of experience in the physical security industry, with a focus on the design and implementation of physical security systems.
* Strong knowledge of physical security systems, including access control, video surveillance, and intrusion detection systems.
* Demonstrated ability to design physical security systems that meet customer requirements and adhere to industry best practices.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with customers, sales teams, and installation and service teams.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
* Experience with project management tools and software, such as Microsoft Project and ERP.
* Ability to travel to customer sites as needed.

If you are a driven, self\\-motivated individual with a passion for delivering high\\-quality physical security solutions to customers, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. We offer competitive compensation and opportunities for growth and advancement within our company.

Jade is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in its workforce. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

description:
Job Description
  
We are looking for an experienced and detail\\-oriented Manual QA Manager with over 15 years of expertise in quality assurance to lead our QA efforts. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing and mentoring QA teams, creating and executing comprehensive test strategies, ensuring adherence to QA best practices, and driving continuous improvement in software quality. This is a leadership role that requires strong technical acumen, excellent problem\\-solving skills, and a proactive approach to managing quality assurance across all stages of the SDLC.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

* Leadership \\& Management:
* Lead, mentor, and manage a team of manual QA engineers to ensure effective performance and professional growth.
* Establish clear roles, responsibilities, and expectations for the QA team.
* Foster a collaborative environment that encourages innovation and accountability.
* Quality Assurance Strategy:
* Develop and implement comprehensive test strategies, plans, and test cases to ensure software quality across all projects.
* Define and monitor QA metrics (e.g., defect densities, open defect counts) to evaluate product quality.
* Establish and maintain QA best practices and processes.
* Test Execution:

* Ensure the timely identification, documentation, and resolution of software defects.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (e.g., developers, product managers) to clarify requirements and resolve issues.
* Process Improvement:
* Identify areas for improvement in the QA process and implement changes to enhance efficiency and accuracy.
* Stay updated on the latest trends and technologies in quality assurance and recommend tools and practices for adoption.
* Stakeholder Collaboration:
* Work closely with development and product management teams to align QA efforts with business goals.
* Provide clear and concise communication to stakeholders regarding testing progress, issues, and quality metrics.
* Compliance and Standards:
* Ensure software testing processes comply with relevant industry standards and regulatory requirements.
* Maintain proper documentation for all QA processes and results.


**Requirements:**  

**Qualification and Experience:**

**Qualifications:**  

* 15\\+ years of experience in manual software testing, with at least 5 years in a managerial or leadership role.

* Proven track record in managing QA teams and delivering high\\-quality software products.
* Expertise in creating detailed test plans, test cases, and test execution reports.

* Exceptional problem\\-solving and analytical skills with a keen eye for detail.
* Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills.


**Preferred Skills:**

title: Sr SQA Engineer (remote)
description:
**Key Responsibilities**:

* **Test Planning and Strategy**: Lead the creation and execution of test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure comprehensive test coverage for new software releases.
* **Manual and Automated Testing**: Perform manual testing for complex scenarios while also developing and maintaining automated test scripts using modern test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, TestNG, JUnit).
* **Test Execution and Defect Management**: Execute tests, document results, identify defects, and track their resolution. Ensure that defects are resolved and re\\-tested in a timely manner.
* **Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD)**: Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline to ensure continuous testing throughout the development lifecycle.
* **Performance and Load Testing**: Conduct performance and load testing to ensure that applications meet required performance benchmarks.
* **Collaboration with Development Teams**: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand the product, identify potential issues early, and ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
* **Mentorship and Leadership**: Provide guidance, mentorship, and training to junior QA team members, fostering a culture of quality within the team.
* **Reporting and Documentation**: Provide regular updates to management regarding testing progress, issues, and risks. Maintain detailed documentation of test cases, test results, and defect reports.
* **Continuous Improvement**: Advocate for and implement best practices in software quality and testing, continuously improving testing processes and methodologies.
* **Risk Management**: Assess risk and test coverage and provide input to help mitigate potential risks during software development.

**Required Qualifications**:

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* 5\\+ years of experience in software quality assurance, with a strong understanding of software development and testing methodologies.
* Hands\\-on experience with both manual and automated testing of web, mobile, and/or desktop applications.
* Proficiency in test automation tools (e.g., Selenium, QTP, TestNG, JUnit, or similar).
* Experience with performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter, LoadRunner, or similar).
* Strong knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).
* Experience with bug tracking tools (e.g., Jira, Bugzilla, or similar).
* Proficient in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test cases and bug reports.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**Hi, we’re Aptly!**  
We’re passionate innovators, industry disruptors, and remote working ninjas. We’re revolutionizing the way the real estate industry interacts with prospects, customers, and their team in an unprecedented time of change. The customer success team at Aptly is responsible for data entry and ongoing support of our product. The team answers customer questions, implements the Aptly solution, performs QA and escalates issues to engineers as the bridge between our customers and our product design and development teams.

* Excellent written communication skills with the ability to explain complex topics in a concise and easy to understand manner
* Ability to understand, prioritize and escalate customer issues when necessary

* A team player

**Bonus skills...**

* Experience working in property management for single family or multifamily properties

title: SQA Engineer
description:
**Department**: Quality Assurance / Ads testing

**Job Overview**:

As a QA/AD Tester, you will be responsible for testing and validating the functionality, performance, and quality of advertisements (ADs) across multiple platforms (web, mobile, apps, etc.). You will ensure that ads are displayed correctly, follow compliance guidelines, and function smoothly without technical issues. You will also collaborate with developers, designers, and ad operations teams to troubleshoot and resolve any ad\\-related issues. This role requires a keen attention to detail, a methodical approach to testing, and a strong ability to identify and communicate defects or inconsistencies.

**Key Responsibilities**:

* Perform functional, regression, and performance testing of digital ads across multiple platforms (web, mobile, desktop, and app environments).
* Validate that ads are displayed correctly and follow specifications (size, format, duration, targeting).
* Test ad interactions (clicks, hover effects, videos, and animations) to ensure proper functionality.
* Verify the compatibility of ads across different browsers and devices.
* Work closely with ad operations, development, and design teams to ensure ad content is delivered as expected.
* Ensure ads meet platform and network requirements (Google Ads, Facebook, etc.).
* Identify, document, and report bugs, defects, and inconsistencies in ad displays.
* Reproduce issues in staging and live environments and work with developers for quick resolution.
* Maintain detailed records of tests, results, and issues found.
* Continuously update test cases based on new requirements, ad types, and platforms.
* Conduct compliance testing to ensure ads meet legal and regulatory standards.
* Contribute to test automation efforts for repetitive testing where applicable.
* Participate in daily stand\\-ups, project meetings, and collaborate within a cross\\-functional team environment.

**Qualifications**:**Required**:

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent experience).
* 2\\+ years of experience in QA or software testing, preferably in ad testing or digital media.
* Strong understanding of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
* Experience in testing across web, mobile, and application platforms.
* Familiarity with digital ad formats (HTML5, banners, video ads, interstitials, etc.).
* Proficiency in working with ad management systems like Google Ad Manager, Facebook Ads, etc.
* Basic knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
* Experience with bug tracking tools (e.g., JIRA, Bugzilla).
* Excellent attention to detail and ability to identify inconsistencies or errors.
* Strong communication skills and ability to work with cross\\-functional teams.

**Preferred**:

* Experience with test automation frameworks and scripting (e.g., Selenium, Appium).
* Familiarity with ad verification and compliance tools (e.g., MOAT, IAS, DoubleVerify).
* Experience in working with video ads, rich media ads, and programmatic ad testing.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development processes.

**Soft Skills**:

* Problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Strong organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks at once.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Ability to adapt to a fast\\-paced and constantly changing environment.

**Benefits**:

* Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
* Health insurance.
* Paid time off and holidays.
* Learning and development opportunities.

description:
Position: QA Automation Test Engineer

Type: 1 Year Contract

Mode: Remote

Job Description: We are looking for a meticulous and innovative QA Test Engineer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing and implementing tests, debugging, and defining corrective actions. They will also review system requirements and track quality assurance metrics to ensure our software runs smoothly and meets client needs.

Responsibilities:

· Develop and Execute Test Plans: Create comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts to ensure software quality.

· Perform Manual and Automated Testing: Execute manual tests and automate test cases using tools like Selenium, JUnit, or similar frameworks.

· Identify and Report Bugs: Identify, document, and track bugs thoroughly using bug tracking tools such as JIRA or Bugzilla.

· Collaborate with Development Team: Work closely with developers to understand the product requirements and implementation details.

· Conduct Regression Testing: Perform regression testing when bugs are resolved to ensure no new issues are introduced.

· Analyze Test Results: Analyze test results, identify trends in defects, and provide insights to improve software quality.

title: SQA Engineer
description:
**Job Overview:**

SQA engineer responsibilities include designing and implementing tests, debugging, and defining corrective actions. You will also review system requirements and track quality assurance metrics (e.g. defect densities and open defect counts.

The QA technician role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needs while being cost\\-effective. If you hold an engineering background and enjoy providing end\\-to\\-end solutions to software quality problems, we’d like to meet you.

Ultimately, you should monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.

**Responsibilities**

* Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
* Create detailed, comprehensive and well\\-structured test plans and test cases.
* Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities.
* Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools.
* Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs.
* Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.
* Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs.
* Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements.
* Monitor debugging process results.
* Investigate the causes of non\\-conforming software and train users to implement solutions.
* Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date with new testing tools and test strategies.

**Requirements**

* **2\\-3** Years of proven work experience in software quality assurance.
* Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
* Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
* Hands\\-on experience with both white box and black box testing.
* Hands\\-on experience with automated testing tools.
* Solid knowledge of MongoDB and scripting.
* Solid knowledge of STLC.
* Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
* Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus.
* BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject.

title: SQA Engineer
description:
As a Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer at TAK Devs PVT LTD, you will be responsible for designing and implementing test strategies, conducting various types of testing, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality software products to our clients.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Test Case Design:** Develop detailed test cases and test scripts based on software specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

* **Automation Testing:** Implement and maintain automated test scripts using testing frameworks and tools (e.g., Selenium, Appium) to improve testing efficiency and coverage.
* **Regression Testing:** Conduct regular regression testing to ensure the stability of the software after code changes.
* **Performance Testing:** Plan and execute performance tests to identify bottlenecks and optimize software performance.
* **Security Testing:** Perform security testing to identify vulnerabilities and ensure the safety of user data.
* **Cross\\-Browser and Cross\\-Platform Testing:** Ensure the software functions correctly on various browsers, operating systems, and devices.
* **Defect Management:** Document and track defects, communicate issues to the development team, and collaborate to resolve them.
* **Continuous Improvement:** Suggest process improvements, best practices, and tools to enhance the QA process and product quality.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* At least 2\\-3 years of proven experience as an SQA Engineer or in a similar quality assurance role in a software development environment.
* Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, tools, and best practices.

* Proficiency in writing clear and concise test cases and test scripts.
* Knowledge of software development processes, agile methodologies, and DevOps practices.
* Familiarity with security testing tools and practices.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication and teamwork skills.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Bi\\-annual increments.
* Lunch \\+ Snacks.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* A dynamic and supportive work environment.
* Exposure to innovative projects and cutting\\-edge technologies.

title: Bidding Executive

**About the Company:**

**About the Role**:

This role is perfect for individuals who are passionate about strategic planning, possess strong analytical skills, and aspire to make a significant impact in the fast\\-paced world of technology solutions.

* **Provide insights and recommendations** for optimizing bid strategies and increasing success rates.

**Requirements**:

* **Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, Marketing, or a related field**.
* **3\\+ years of experience in bid management, proposal writing, or a similar role**.
* **Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills**.
* **Proficiency in proposal writing and tender management software**.
* **Familiarity with industry regulations and compliance requirements**.
* **Excellent written and verbal communication skills**.
* **Strong organizational skills**, with attention to detail and ability to manage multiple deadlines.
* **Ability to work collaboratively in a cross\\-functional team environment**.
* **Eagerness to stay informed about industry trends and market developments**.
* **Demonstrated passion for technology and innovation**.
* **Self\\-motivated with a strong sense of initiative and leadership**.
* **Detail\\-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously**.

We offer competitive compensation and opportunities for professional growth and advancement. If you are a highly motivated and driven individual with a passion for strategic bidding and technology solutions, we want to hear from you!

title: Structural Engineer
description:
**Job Overview:**

We are seeking a qualified and experienced Structural Engineer to join our team remotely in Florida. The ideal candidate will work on various projects, focusing on design, analysis, and structural integrity assessments of residential, commercial, and infrastructure structures. The Structural Engineer will ensure compliance with Florida state codes, standards, and environmental regulations, especially when considering hurricane and flood\\-resistant requirements.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop detailed structural designs and analyses for new and existing buildings, foundations, bridges, and other structures. Ensure compliance with building codes, safety standards, and Florida\\-specific hurricane and flood\\-resistant requirements.
* Oversee the execution of structural engineering projects from inception to completion, including timelines, budgeting, and resource allocation.
* Conduct site inspections and structural assessments, including post\\-hurricane evaluations, to ensure safety, durability, and compliance with regulatory standards.
* Work closely with architects, construction managers, and other engineers (e.g., civil, mechanical, electrical) to ensure seamless project integration and effective communication.
* Prepare technical reports, engineering calculations, design documentation, and construction drawings. Ensure proper documentation and compliance with Florida's legal and regulatory requirements.
* Identify structural issues and develop cost\\-effective and innovative solutions.
* Oversee and manage all on\\-site construction activities, ensuring adherence to structural design specifications, blueprints, and local building codes, including Florida’s hurricane\\-resistant and flood regulations.
* Conduct regular inspections and quality assessments to ensure that construction meets structural engineering standards. Identify and address any issues or deviations from the approved design.
* Work closely with contractors, architects, and other engineers to facilitate smooth project execution. Ensure effective communication between all parties to align with project goals and timelines.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Structural Engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum 3\\-5 years of experience in structural engineering, with experience in Florida\\-specific projects preferred.
* Professional Engineer (PE) license is required.
* Proficiency in structural design software (e.g., AutoCAD, STAAD Pro, Revit, SAP2000\\) and strong knowledge of Florida building codes and standards.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively collaborate with clients, team members, and regulatory authorities.
* Strong attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines effectively.

**Preferred Skills:**

* Experience with hurricane\\-resistant design and materials
* Familiarity with FEMA guidelines and post\\-disaster assessment processes
* Understanding of BIM processes and software

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**About Techozon Software House:**

At Techozon Software House, we're a leading force in developing innovative software solutions for a wide range of industries. We are on the lookout for a highly skilled DevOps Engineer with a strong foundation in Scrum and Agile methodologies to join our dynamic team in Islamabad.

**Job Description:**

Techozon Software House is looking for highly skilled and proactive DevOps Engineer with a strong foundation in Scrum and Agile methodologies to join our innovative technology team. The successful candidate will be integral to our software development and operations processes, fostering collaboration, driving automation, and optimizing infrastructure for peak performance and reliability. This role requires a strong technical foundation in DevOps methodologies, a deep understanding of cloud environments, and an agile mindset to support continuous improvement across the organization.

**Key Responsibilities**:

* Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to streamline software builds, testing, and deployments across all environments.
* Automate infrastructure provisioning, configuration management, and deployment processes using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or Chef.
* Collaborate closely with software development, IT operations, and security teams to ensure alignment on deployment practices, security, and compliance requirements.
* Monitor, troubleshoot, and resolve infrastructure and application issues to maintain a high standard of availability and reliability.
* Manage and optimize cloud\\-based infrastructures (AWS, Azure, GCP) to support scalable, efficient, and cost\\-effective solutions.
* Build, deploy, and manage containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring seamless orchestration and automated scaling.
* Implement and manage security policies, access controls, and compliance measures to secure systems and data.
* Develop and maintain robust logging, monitoring, and alerting systems with tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, or Splunk, ensuring proactive issue detection and resolution.
* Identify and implement performance enhancements to improve efficiency, scalability, and reliability of software delivery processes.
* Conduct regular system audits and backups, disaster recovery, and failover procedures to guarantee business continuity.
* Document configurations, processes, and systems thoroughly, ensuring knowledge transfer and operational transparency.
* Foster a DevOps culture by promoting best practices, mentorship, and continuous learning within the team and across departments.

**Required Skills and Qualifications**:

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
* Minimum of 3\\+ years of experience as a DevOps Engineer or in a similar role, with a strong focus on automation and infrastructure as code (IaC).
* Hands\\-on experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, GitHub Actions, or CircleCI.
* Proficiency in infrastructure automation tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible, Puppet, Chef) and a deep understanding of IaC principles.
* Strong expertise in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud), including cloud networking, storage, and security configurations.
* Advanced knowledge of containerization and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes), including experience with Helm charts.
* Scripting skills in languages such as Bash, Python, or PowerShell to automate workflows and manage system configurations.
* Solid understanding of Linux/Unix system administration, networking fundamentals, and best practices in cloud security.
* Proven experience in monitoring, logging, and alerting tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, Splunk, ELK Stack, or CloudWatch.

**Preferred Skills and Competencies**:

* Experience with serverless architectures, microservices, and distributed systems.
* Knowledge of advanced networking configurations (VPN, load balancing, VPCs) within cloud environments.
* Familiarity with Agile and DevOps methodologies, as well as a demonstrated ability to work within an Agile development framework.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, critical thinking, and the ability to perform under pressure and prioritize effectively.
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with a proactive and collaborative approach to team environments.

**What We Offer:**

Competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package.

A collaborative and innovative work environment.

Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.

Exciting projects with cutting\\-edge technologies.

A healthy work\\-life balance and flexible work arrangements.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Experience: 3\\+ years

Location: Islamabad

description:

If you are passionate about providing exceptional technical support and have expertise in NodeJS, Angular, TypeScript, AWS, and ELK, we would love to hear from you.

and rewarding environment.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide second\\-level technical support: Investigate, diagnose, and resolve complex technical issues reported by end\\-users or escalated from Level 1 Support.

* Troubleshoot Angular, NodeJS, and TypeScript: Analyze and debug code to identify and resolve software defects, performance bottlenecks, and compatibility issues.
* Application monitoring and incident management: Monitor the application performance, log data in ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) stack, and proactively identify issues or anomalies. Respond to incidents promptly, perform root cause analysis, and implement corrective actions.
* AWS deployment and maintenance: Work with the DevOps team to ensure smooth deployment, configuration, and maintenance of the application on AWS infrastructure, including EC2 instances, load balancers, and other relevant services.
* Documentation and knowledge sharing: Document support processes, known issues, and troubleshooting steps. Contribute to the internal knowledge base and provide training and guidance to Level 1 Support as needed.
* Customer communication: Effectively communicate with end\\-users, understand their technical concerns, and provide clear and concise instructions or resolutions in a professional and friendly manner.
* Continuous improvement: Identify opportunities to enhance the application’s performance, stability, and scalability. Provide feedback to the development team for bug fixes, feature enhancements, and overall product improvements.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* **1\\-2 years** of relevant experience in a technical support role, preferably supporting software applications built with NodeJS, Angular and TypeScript. Demonstrated experience in troubleshooting, debugging, and resolving complex technical issues related to these technologies is required.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities. Proficient in troubleshooting and debugging applications built with NodeJS, Angular, and TypeScript technologies.
* Hands\\-on experience with AWS services such as ECS, CloudFront, WAF, S3, RDS, and CloudWatch. Familiarity with infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools like CloudFormation or Terraform is a plus.
* Good understanding of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
* Hands\\-on experience with WebSockets.
* Understanding of database management and query optimization using SQL, with hands\\-on experience in MySQL for database modeling, querying, and performance tuning.
* Familiarity with Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana for log management and analysis.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities to diagnose and resolve complex technical issues.
* Knowledge of Python and Linux would be a plus.
* Knowledge of version control using GIT.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines.
* Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders, providing clear and concise instructions and explanations.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams, including developers, QA engineers, DevOps, and product managers.
* Capable of taking ownership of tasks, managing priorities, and working independently with minimal supervision.
* Willingness to work in a fast\\-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities and requirements.

**Ability to work flexible hours to accommodate support needs during US business hours, including early mornings, evenings, and occasional weekends.**  
**This may involve participating in an on\\-call rotation to provide timely assistance to customers or address critical issues.**

**Note:** Please keep in mind that the specific working hours and on\\-call requirements can be further discussed and negotiated during the interview process based on the needs of the organization and the support team.

* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving abilities.
