title: Senior Computer Vision Engineer
description:
**About Kodifly:**  

Kodifly is at the forefront of transforming infrastructure monitoring through advanced spatial intelligence. Based in the vibrant hub of Hong Kong Science Park and backed by initiatives like HKAI Lab and the Nvidia Inception program and now expanding to Islamabad, Pakistan \\- we specialize in pioneering 3D point cloud processing, digital twin creation, and cutting\\-edge LiDAR technology. Our flagship product, SpatialSense, integrates these technologies to provide real\\-time, actionable insights that enhance the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of infrastructure projects.  

  

**Job Description:**  

We are looking for a 3D Computer Vision Engineer with a focus on point cloud data processing to join our dynamic team in Islamabad, Pakistan. Your role will be pivotal in developing solutions for SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping), point cloud registration, camera\\-LiDAR calibration, and applying deep learning techniques to point cloud data. The expertise you will bring to the table will be crucial in using point cloud data to empower smart cities!

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design and implement algorithms for 3D point cloud processing, object recognition, and segmentation.
* Enhance and optimize SLAM algorithms for real\\-time application in mobile and static environments.
* Integrate and optimize AI technologies such as Open3D and 2D\\+3D inference models into our existing systems for improved 2D \\& 3D data analysis and visualization.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams in Pakistan and Hong Kong to integrate new features into SpatialSense.
* Conduct R\\&D to explore new techniques in computer vision and machine learning that can improve infrastructure monitoring.
* Ensure the robustness and accuracy of our computer vision applications under various operational conditions
* Design and develop computer vision algorithms and models for various applications, including object detection, image classification, segmentation, and tracking.
* Optimize computer vision algorithms and models to leverage the power of NVIDIA hardware, such as GPUs and specialized accelerators (e.g., NVIDIA Tensor Cores).
* Collaborate with hardware engineers and architects to explore and utilize the latest features and capabilities of NVIDIA hardware platforms.
* Conduct performance profiling and benchmarking of computer vision algorithms on NVIDIA hardware to identify bottlenecks and optimize resource utilization.
* Implement and integrate computer vision algorithms into end\\-to\\-end systems, ensuring scalability, robustness, and real\\-time performance on NVIDIA hardware.
* Collaborate with researchers and academic partners to explore and evaluate state\\-of\\-the\\-art computer vision techniques and their application on NVIDIA hardware.

**Qualifications:**

* 3\\+ years of experience
* Bachelors, Masters or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field with a specialization in computer vision.
* Strong background in 3D point cloud data processing, including experience with SLAM, point cloud registration, and camera\\-LiDAR calibration.
* Proficiency in applying deep learning methods to point cloud data.
* Strong expertise in deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch, and proficiency in programming languages like Python and C\\+\\+.
* Extensive experience in optimizing computer vision algorithms for NVIDIA hardware, including GPUs and specialized accelerators (e.g., NVIDIA Tensor Cores).
* In\\-depth understanding of computer vision concepts, including image processing, feature extraction, object detection, and segmentation.
* Hands\\-on experience with NVIDIA CUDA and cuDNN libraries, as well as frameworks like TensorRT for efficient deployment on NVIDIA hardware.
* Knowledge of parallel computing principles and GPU programming techniques is a plus.
* Familiarity with computer vision libraries and tools, such as OpenCV, Dlib, or PCL.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to optimize algorithms for performance and accuracy on NVIDIA hardware.
* Experience with ROS software and methodologies.
* Proficient in programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or similar.
* Knowledge of machine learning and deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
* Excellent analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.
* Team\\-oriented with an ability to work in a collaborative environment.

**We Offer:**

* Opportunity to work with state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology in a rapidly evolving field.
* A collaborative environment where innovation is encouraged and rewarded.
* Competitive salary and share options.
* Professional and personal growth opportunities and a chance to make a significant impact in infrastructure safety and efficiency.

**Join Us at Kodifly:** If you’re ready to apply your computer vision skills to tackle real\\-world challenges and drive technological advancement, Kodifly is looking for you. Apply now and begin your journey at the cutting edge of infrastructure technology!

Kodifly is at the forefront of transforming infrastructure monitoring through advanced spatial intelligence. Based in the vibrant hub of Hong Kong Science Park and backed by initiatives like HKAI Lab and the Nvidia Inception program and now expanding to Islamabad, Pakistan \\- we specialize in pioneering 3D point cloud processing, digital twin creation, and cutting\\-edge LiDAR technology. title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**About Kodifly:**  

Kodifly is at the forefront of transforming infrastructure monitoring through advanced spatial intelligence. Based in the vibrant hub of Hong Kong Science Park and backed by initiatives like HKAI Lab and the Nvidia Inception program and now expanding to Islamabad, Pakistan \\- we specialize in pioneering 3D point cloud processing, digital twin creation, and cutting\\-edge LiDAR technology. Our flagship product, SpatialSense, integrates these technologies to provide real\\-time, actionable insights that enhance the safety, efficiency, and sustainability of infrastructure projects.

**Job Description:**  

We are looking for a DevOps Engineer with a focus on edge \\& cloud data processing to join our dynamic team in Islamabad, Pakistan. Your role will be pivotal in developing state of the art applications for the edge and cloud. The expertise you will bring to the table will be crucial in using point cloud data to empower smart cities!

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, implement, and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure solutions.

* Create cutting applications for the edge and cloud
* Participate in the design and development of new features that utilize cutting\\-edge computer vision techniques to advance our digital twin technology.
* Analyze performance data and iterate on our solutions to enhance accuracy and robustness in spatial data handling.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelors, Masters or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* Proficiency in creating applications for the cloud and edge
* Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or in a similar role.
* Experience with ROS software and methodologies.
* Proficient in scripting and programming languages such as C\\+\\+, Python, or similar.
* Excellent analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.
* Team\\-oriented with an ability to work in a collaborative environment.

**We Offer:**

**Join Us at Kodifly:** If you’re ready to apply your devops skills to tackle real\\-world challenges and drive technological advancement, Kodifly is looking for you. Apply now and begin your journey at the cutting edge of infrastructure technology!

title: Junior SQA Engineer
description:

As a Senior SQA Engineer at Pure Elements Technologies, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products. You will collaborate with development teams to identify and resolve issues, and ensure that our products meet the highest standards of quality.

**Key Responsibilities**:

* Automation Testing: Design, implement, and maintain automated test scripts using industry\\-standard tools and frameworks to enhance testing efficiency.
* Defect Management: Identify, document, and track defects and issues, and work closely with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
* Test Documentation: Prepare and maintain detailed test documentation, including test cases, test scripts, and test reports.
* Quality Metrics: Monitor and analyze quality metrics to identify trends and areas for improvement.
* Collaboration: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and ensure seamless integration of testing processes.
* Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in software testing and quality assurance.

**Requirements:**

* Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in software quality assurance, with expertise in both manual and automated testing.

Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.

title: Sr. DevOps Engineer - Eastern Time Zone
description:
Are you an experienced and passionate DevOps engineer? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy optimizing deployment processes? If so, CodingKey is looking for you!

CodingKey is a fast\\-growing company providing exceptional outsourcing services to clients across four continents. Our team of technology experts is dedicated to resolving our clients’ challenges, allowing them to focus on their core business while we deliver outstanding results.

As a Senior DevOps Engineer at CodingKey, you’ll have the opportunity to work on innovative projects and enhance our infrastructure and deployment pipelines. You’ll collaborate with our skilled engineering team to implement best practices in automation, continuous integration, and delivery. We value creativity, innovation, and a commitment to excellence in every aspect of our work.

**What You’ll Do:**

* **Build Scalable Infrastructure:** Develop resilient systems to support our production services.
* **Enhance Observability:** Grow and improve our platform’s observability capabilities.
* **Drive CI/CD Practices:** Implement best practices for continuous integration and delivery, and build deployment pipelines.
* **Collaborate with Engineers:** Work closely with our engineering team to break apart existing infrastructure into decoupled services using ECS Fargate and other AWS services.
* **Own Our AWS Infrastructure:** Manage our AWS account and infrastructure, ensuring best practices and acting as a subject matter expert.
* **Implement Security Controls:** Work with stakeholders to secure our platform.
* **Advocate for Agile Methodologies:** Promote Lean and Agile Software Development practices.

**What We’re Looking For:**

* **Experience:** 5\\+ years in Devops with a pragmatic approach that balances technical skills and business needs.
* **Cloud Expertise:** Proficient in cloud platforms (preferably AWS) and networking protocols.
* **Process\\-Oriented:** Strong documentation skills and a process\\-oriented mindset.
* **Collaborative:** A team\\-focused engineer who thrives in a dynamic environment.
* **Passionate:** Enthusiastic about cloud technology, software development methodologies, and building efficient platforms.

**Technical Skills:**

* **Infrastructure as Code:** Terraform, Ansible, AWS CDK, CloudFormation
* **CI/CD Tools:** CircleCI, GitHub Actions
* **Scripting:** Python, JavaScript, Bash
* **Serverless Containers:** AWS Fargate, Lambda
* **Monitoring:** Datadog, New Relic, OpenTelemetry
* **Databases:** NoSQL (MongoDB) and Relational (PostgreSQL)
* **Security:** VPC security, web application firewalls

If you are a motivated and passionate DevOps engineer who excels in a fast\\-paced environment, we want to hear from you! Join CodingKey and become part of our talented team, where you can enhance your skills, work on exciting projects, and make a significant impact.

Apply now, and let’s unlock your full potential together!

title: Software Engineer, Machine Learning
description:
**Who we are:**



Motive empowers the people who run physical operations with tools to make their work safer, more productive, and more profitable. For the first time ever, safety, operations and finance teams can manage their drivers, vehicles, equipment, and fleet related spend in a single system. Combined with industry leading AI, the Motive platform gives you complete visibility and control, and significantly reduces manual workloads by automating and simplifying tasks.



Motive serves more than 120,000 customers – from Fortune 500 enterprises to small businesses – across a wide range of industries, including transportation and logistics, construction, energy, field service, manufacturing, agriculture, food and beverage, retail, and the public sector.



Visit gomotive.com to learn more.

### **About the Role:**



As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will be a part of a team which develops and deploys cutting edge AI solutions for our product line. This role will give you an opportunity to work on developing models using advanced algorithms and machine learning techniques to solve some of the most pressing problems for fleet safety and best in class Dashcams. As a part of the R\\&D team, you will also be responsible for deploying these models while working across cross functional teams.


### **What You'll Do:**


* Develop solutions to complex problems using AI, algorithms and machine learning techniques
* Develop machine learning models using classical and deep learning techniques
* Collaborate with a cross functional team to design and document scalable solutions
* Write secure, maintainable code that powers the platform that connects the world's trucks
* Launch and support features that will be used by trucking industry and its partners
* Lead code reviews and help to guide software architecture decisions.

### **What We're Looking For:**


* A degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field
* Exceptional problem solving and analytical skills
* Strong programming skills in Python
* Solid understanding of machine learning models and techniques
* Experience with deep learning models
* An affinity for creating software that is extensible, performant, and easy to read
* Experience with time series problems (good to have)

 *Creating a diverse and inclusive workplace is one of Motive's core values. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives.*


*Please review our Candidate Privacy Notice* *here.*


*The applicant must be authorized to receive and access those commodities and technologies controlled under U.S. Export Administration Regulations.* *It is Motive's policy to require that employees be authorized to receive access to Motive products and technology.*

title: Building Surveyor
description:
Ovaisco Builders \\& Developers is a leader in the construction and real estate industry, committed to delivering innovative, sustainable, and high\\-quality projects. With a portfolio spanning residential, commercial, and marquee developments, we prioritize excellence, client satisfaction, and industry best practices. We are currently seeking a skilled Building Surveyor to join our team and ensure that our projects meet all necessary standards and specifications.  
The Building Surveyor will be responsible for inspecting, assessing, and ensuring that construction projects adhere to regulations, quality standards, and safety requirements. This role involves conducting detailed surveys, preparing reports, and advising project teams on necessary repairs, maintenance, and structural requirements. The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of building codes, construction processes, and regulatory compliance.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Conduct thorough site surveys to assess the structural integrity, layout, and compliance of buildings and other structures.
* Perform regular inspections throughout the construction phases, ensuring adherence to approved designs, quality standards, and safety regulations.
* Review project plans and blueprints to ensure they comply with local building codes, zoning laws, and health and safety regulations.
* Advise the project team on compliance requirements and take corrective actions if necessary.
* Identify potential structural or environmental risks and recommend preventative measures to mitigate them.
* Prepare detailed reports on structural conditions, highlighting any repairs, modifications, or improvements required to meet standards.
* Conduct condition surveys on existing buildings and infrastructure, identifying areas requiring maintenance, upgrades, or repairs.
* Develop cost estimates and timelines for recommended repair or maintenance work.
* Maintain accurate records of inspections, surveys, and assessments, and prepare detailed reports for project and management review.
* Document any issues identified during inspections and track their resolution.
* Work closely with architects, engineers, and construction teams to ensure alignment on project objectives and specifications.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to project teams to support timely and effective decision\\-making.

**Key Requirements:**

**Education:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Building Surveying, Civil Engineering, or a related field.

**Experience:**

* Minimum of 3\\-5 years of experience as a Building Surveyor, ideally within the construction or real estate sector.

**Skills:**

* Proficiency in surveying tools and software, such as AutoCAD or GIS.
* Strong understanding of building codes, construction standards, and regulatory compliance.
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving skills.

**Competencies:**

* Detail\\-oriented with high standards for accuracy and quality.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical information clearly to stakeholders.
* Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and handle multiple site inspections.

**Why Join Us?**  
At Ovaisco Builders \\& Developers, we offer a unique opportunity to contribute to high\\-profile construction projects. We provide competitive compensation, a supportive work environment, and a platform for career growth within the field of building surveying and construction.

Job Type: Full\\-time

Pay: Rs30,000\\.00 \\- Rs50,000\\.00 per month

description:
**Role Overview**

We are Looking for smart, energetic, and personable technology business professionals for a Data Engineer position. As a Data Engineer, you will participate in data management and engineering projects within cloud environments, including migrating, analyzing, and managing data structures. You will also assist in designing, defining, developing, and testing AWS data solution components. * Experience in implementing data pipelines.
* Strong analytical skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving data\\-related challenges.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively with cross\\-functional teams and stakeholders to drive successful outcomes.

**EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE**

title: Software Engineer, MLOps
description:
**Who we are:**



Motive empowers the people who run physical operations with tools to make their work safer, more productive, and more profitable. For the first time ever, safety, operations and finance teams can manage their drivers, vehicles, equipment, and fleet related spend in a single system. Combined with industry leading AI, the Motive platform gives you complete visibility and control, and significantly reduces manual workloads by automating and simplifying tasks.



Motive serves more than 120,000 customers – from Fortune 500 enterprises to small businesses – across a wide range of industries, including transportation and logistics, construction, energy, field service, manufacturing, agriculture, food and beverage, retail, and the public sector.



Visit gomotive.com to learn more.

**About the Role:**



In this role, you will be responsible for driving the execution of crucial infrastructure and platform initiatives related to AI/ML pipelines. These pipelines are designed for highly efficient and scalable model Training, \\& Inference. The responsibilities include building and developing tools, automation of redundant tasks, and CI/CD systems. This role requires someone with a strong collaborative and growth mindset. You will also look after the career development of the engineering team members.


**What You'll Do:**


* Design, develop and deploy MLOps infrastructure for to improve the velocity of development and deployment of AI and deep learning models: CI/CD, input data unit and statistical testing, experiment tracking, model registry, and monitoring and alerting of production features
* Design, develop and deploy scalable cloud AI/ML pipelines for customer\\-facing inference and visualization services
* Develop, implement and administer best MLOps practices relating to model development automation, evaluation, testing and deployment
* Focus on addressing availability issues, work on scaling pipelines, and improving features while maintaining SLAs on performance, reliability, and system availability
* Work with technical leads and managers to understand project requirements and business needs and collaborate with engineers across teams to identify and deliver features, services \\& pipelines
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams such as Backend, Frontend, and Platform to ensure the development and delivery of end\\-to\\-end product features, and robust and scalable AI pipelines
* Mentor junior team members


**What We're Looking For:**


* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
* 4\\+ years experience in designing, implementing, and operating scalable software systems and services
* 4\\+ years hands\\-on experience with MLOps and DevOps tools (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, Kubeflow, Spark, Airflow, AWS, CI/CD)
* Solid CS foundations including in data structures, algorithms and software engineering
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
* You collaborate effectively with other teams and communicate clearly about your work.
* Knowledge of one or more of computer vision, deep learning, machine learning, or statistical and predictive modeling is a strong plus

*Creating a diverse and inclusive workplace is one of Motive's core values. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives.*


*Please review our Candidate Privacy Notice* *here.*


*The applicant must be authorized to receive and access those commodities and technologies controlled under U.S. Export Administration Regulations.* *It is Motive's policy to require that employees be authorized to receive access to Motive products and technology.*

title: Lead SQA Engineer
description:
As a Senior SQA Automation Engineer, you will play a critical role in designing, developing, and maintaining automated test frameworks and test scripts to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications. You will work closely with development and QA teams to identify testing needs, create comprehensive test plans, and execute automated tests to support continuous integration and delivery.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Automation Framework Development:** Design, develop, and maintain scalable and reusable automation frameworks for various types of testing (e.g., functional, regression, performance).
* **Test Script Creation:** Write and execute automated test scripts using appropriate tools and languages (e.g., Selenium, TestNG, JUnit, Python, Java).
* **Continuous Integration:** Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline to support continuous integration and continuous deployment practices.
* **Test Planning:** Collaborate with product owners, developers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and create detailed test plans and scenarios.
* **Issue Tracking and Reporting:** Identify, document, and report defects and issues discovered during automated testing. Work with development teams to ensure timely resolution.
* **Performance Testing:** Develop and execute performance and load tests to ensure application scalability and performance under various conditions.
* **Mentorship:** Provide guidance and mentorship to junior QA engineers and support the team in adopting best practices for automation and testing.
* **Tool Evaluation:** Evaluate and recommend new tools and technologies to improve automation processes and overall testing efficiency.
* **Documentation:** Maintain comprehensive documentation of test cases, test scripts, and test results. Ensure that documentation is up\\-to\\-date and accurate.
* **Quality Improvement:** Continuously review and improve test processes and methodologies to enhance the overall quality of software releases.

**Qualifications:**

* **Education:** Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* **Experience:** Minimum of 5 years of experience in software quality assurance with a strong focus on automation. Proven experience in leading automation projects is required.
* **Skills:**
* Expertise in automation tools and frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Appium, Cucumber).
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.
* Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, including functional, regression, and performance testing.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI) and version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Familiarity with test management tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail).
* **Attributes:**
* Excellent analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
* Strong communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.

title: Project Manager (Construction Industry)
description:
**IMPORTANT NOTE:** Only Retired Army personnel may Apply other applicants will not be considered.

A Leading and well\\-known Construction Group requires the services of a Smart, Experienced \\& Enthusiastic freshly *retired Army Officer* for the position of Project Manager at its Sites located in Bahria Town Rawalpindi to oversee and manage a variety of construction projects from inception to completion. The successful candidate will be responsible for coordinating and supervising all construction procedures to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and meet the required specifications. This role requires a deep understanding of construction methodologies, strong organizational skills, and the ability to lead a diverse team of professionals.

**Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with engineers, architects, and other stakeholders to determine project specifications and requirements.
* Negotiate contracts with external vendors and subcontractors to ensure favorable and profitable agreements.
* Obtain permits and licenses from relevant authorities and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
* Identify and allocate the necessary resources, including manpower, equipment, and materials, while adhering to budget limitations.
* Develop a comprehensive construction plan, including scheduling intermediate phases to ensure project deadlines are met.
* Procure equipment and materials and monitor inventory to address any inadequacies in a timely manner.
* Recruit and hire contractors and other staff members, assigning responsibilities and providing guidance as needed.
* Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics, and other construction personnel, ensuring adherence to project plans and specifications.
* Evaluate project progress, prepare detailed reports, and communicate updates to stakeholders.
* Ensure strict adherence to health and safety standards on the construction site and report any issues that arise.

**Requirements and Skills:**

* Proven experience as a construction project manager, demonstrating successful project delivery.
* In\\-depth understanding of construction procedures, materials, and project management principles.
* Familiarity with quality standards and health and safety regulations in the construction industry.
* Proficiency in MS Office applications for project documentation and reporting.
* Familiarity with construction/project management software for efficient planning and organization.
* Excellent communication and negotiation skills to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders.
* Strong organizational and time\\-management abilities to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
* A team player with leadership qualities, capable of motivating and coordinating a multidisciplinary team.
* Master's degree in Project Management or a related field, along with a Bachelor's degree (BSc/BA) in engineering, building science, or a relevant field.
* PMP (Project Management Professional) certification or 5 years of hands on experience.

If you meet the above requirements and are ready to take on the challenge of managing construction projects to successful completion, we would like to hear from you. Please submit your resume, highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.

Job Type: Full\\-time

description:

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description:
**Who we are:**



Motive empowers the people who run physical operations with tools to make their work safer, more productive, and more profitable. For the first time ever, safety, operations and finance teams can manage their drivers, vehicles, equipment, and fleet related spend in a single system. Combined with industry leading AI, the Motive platform gives you complete visibility and control, and significantly reduces manual workloads by automating and simplifying tasks.



Motive serves more than 120,000 customers – from Fortune 500 enterprises to small businesses – across a wide range of industries, including transportation and logistics, construction, energy, field service, manufacturing, agriculture, food and beverage, retail, and the public sector.



Visit gomotive.com to learn more.

**About the role:**



As a Computer Vision Engineer, you will be a part of a passionate team whose mission is to bring intelligence to the world's trucks. The team is focused on building technology to understand driving behavior, identify risk factors, and intelligently suggest coachable events that not only improves the fleet safety and potentially save millions of dollars but also contribute to making the roads safer. You will have a unique opportunity to work with a high caliber and fast\\-paced team which consists of experienced researchers and engineers in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Robotics with a track record of previous products and top\\-tier publications.



You will play a critical role in building and improving a technology that will be used by millions of trucks. In this role, you will design and implement complex computer vision systems. You will have the opportunity to build and/or improve algorithms for edge processing, implement cloud services, and integrate them to deliver end\\-to\\-end product features. You will also get exposure to large\\-scale ML infra and scaling that facilitates large amounts of data to train, test, and validate computer vision systems.

  


**What You'll Do:**


* Improve the performance of our models and algorithms already in production
* Build and optimize CV/ML algorithms for real\\-time performance so they can run on our embedded platform i.e. the next\\-gen AI dashcam
* Write proficient Python and C\\+\\+ code to build and improve CV algorithms, ML services, training, model compression and porting pipelines
* Convert state\\-of\\-the\\-art research prototypes into reliably working product features
* Collaborate with RnD team working in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Robotics, along with ML Platform, Embedded, Backend, and Frontend teams to deliver end\\-to\\-end product features
* Solve challenging object detection, segmentation, recognition, and geometric computer vision problems.
* Build automated deployment, validation, and active learning pipelines.

  


**What We're Looking For:**


* Bachelors degree in computer science, software engineering, data science, artificial intelligence, or related field.
* Masters or PhD in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, and Machine Learning (preferred)
* Solid mathematical foundation in Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and optimization approaches.
* Hands\\-on experience in training framework and tools (TensorFlow \\| Pytorch \\| Caffe)
* Strong experience in Python or C\\+\\+
* Hands\\-on experience in building embedded algorithms and applications
* Experience in the following tools and technologies is a plus: AWS (SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS), CI/CD, Terraform, Docker, and Kubernetes.
* Prior experience with Eigen library and RTOS is a strong plus

*Creating a diverse and inclusive workplace is one of Motive's core values. We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives.*


*Please review our Candidate Privacy Notice* *here.*


*The applicant must be authorized to receive and access those commodities and technologies controlled under U.S. Export Administration Regulations.* *It is Motive's policy to require that employees be authorized to receive access to Motive products and technology.*

As the trusted provider to over 22,000 enterprise locations worldwide, our mission is to help our clients connect and communicate easily. We aim to delight our customers and partners by providing personalized, outstanding service.


The company has built a solid reputation of integrity, reliability and dependability with its channel partners, end\\-user customers and technology partners.


We have received more than 100 coveted industry awards including "Product of the Year\\- SD\\-WAN and UCaaS", "Excellence in Customer Service", "Unified Communications Excellence", "Best in Show," "Best Telecom Deal" and "Top Channel Program".

 **Job Description**  

GENERAL PURPOSE


The Managed Services Engineer will be responsible for successfully managing, creating, designing, implementing and turning up AireSpring’s services that include, but are not limited to:·

* Data \\& Voice Services
* SDWAN /MPLS
* Hosted/Cloud PBX/VoIP
* Manage IP enhancements and procedures to support the Operations Department. Focus is on new technologies, products and processes. Providing management with expert advice for short and long\\-term department objectives. Acting as liaison to Operations to achieve these goals. Strong customer service skills and ability to manage multiple projects.

  

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES


Responsibilities include but are not limited to:

* Strong background, experience and working knowledge with the routing and switching protocols Border Gate protocol (BGP), Enhanced Interior Gateway Protocol (EIGRP), Open Short Path First (OSPF), Rapid Spanning Tree Protocol (RSTP), Hot Standby Routing Protocol (HSRP), Virtual Routing Redundant Protocol (VRRP), Gateway Load Balancing Protocol (GLBP) and familiar with Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) design
* Knowledge and experience monitoring BGP connections with internet peers and reviewing core network stability and usage.
* Maintaining and creating resiliency for the core network with HSRP, VRRP, GLBP protocols.
* Network security and Intrusion Detection System (IDS) management.
* Configuration and installation of Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) (routers and switches and firewalls) and customer network infrastructure in support of VOIP and Data Network Services (DNS).
* Perform IP site outage troubleshooting: Hardware failure, Circuit failure, Hardware reboot, Software issues ( IP Routing, Switching, Internet Operating System (IOS), DNS, VOIP)
* QoS monitoring hosted services.
* Develop and manage any related/required infrastructure documentation.
* Participate in management meetings for projects related to the infrastructure.
* Advises and helps design new build outs of the infrastructure.
* Develops and conducts testing procedures for new infrastructure projects as required.
* Strongly self\\-motivated and willing to tackle challenging problem
* Required to work with our customers, vendors and other departments at Airespring to ensure on\\-time and proper delivery of our services, meeting the needs of our customers and our company’s standards.
* Create, write and maintain processes and procedures

  

**Qualifications**  

DESIRED MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS


Education and Experience:


Graduation from an accredited program, a four‑year college or university with a degree in B.S Computer Engineering, desirable M.S in Network Engineering


5\\-7 years of experience in Telecommunications and Networking, or


Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


NECESSARY KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, AND ABILITIES

* Must possess excellent management and technical problem \\& resolution skills with the ability to work independently while meeting demanding time lines.
* Network Management, routing protocols and Security
* Adtran or Cisco CPE and configuration knowledge
* Voice Over IP knowledge of SIP (HPBX and trunking) and deployment of VoIP systems
* Experience with Sansay and Metaswitch SBCs is a plus
* Metro Ethernet Technologies
* Hardware / Software Troubleshooting
* LAN/WAN Optimization
* Experience with Cisco, Polycom, Grandstream and Aastra (Mitel) phones
* Project Management

  

**Additional Information**  

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: AWS Cloud Engineer
description:
Cloudelligent is looking for experienced candidates for the position of AWS Cloud Engineer.
  
  

**Position Title:** AWS Cloud Engineer
  
  

**Location:** Remote
  
  

**Job Timings:** 8am\\-5pm Central Time (US)
  
  

About Cloudelligent
  
  

Cloudelligent is Cloud\\-native consultancy and AWS Advanced consulting partner! We specialize in providing bespoke cloud solutions to the SMB \\& enterprise segments as well as the public sector (Non\\-Profit Organizations). Being a next\\-gen cloud service provider, Cloudelligent helps small businesses \\& medium/large enterprises to break free from hardware lifecycle and capital expenditures, allowing them to make the most out of their cloud investment. We have an international footprint with a diverse team of domain experts, and we are customer obsessed.
  
  

Job Objective
  
  

As an AWS Cloud Engineer, you will be at the center of efforts to build and/or redesign scalable software solutions. You will design, develop, test, and debug cloud infrastructure and deployment automation in support of company's development team. Your efforts will be critical to ensuring we are following DevOps best practices such as infrastructure as code, use of deployment and maintenance automation at all stages of our SDLC. The job entails ensuring seamless service to our customers and maintaining a complex product based on cutting edge technology. Working at Cloudelligent, you would be in a highly versatile team with in\\-depth knowledge of their specialized areas. We are successfully developing a culture of knowledge sharing and personal development within our team.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

* Create innovative solutions leveraging cloud platforms to solve client business challenges.
* Gather requirements, assess client capabilities, and analyze findings to provide appropriate cloud recommendations and adoption strategy.
* Create conceptual, logical, and physical design for cloud\\-based solutions for infrastructure and platforms.
* Implement and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies on AWS.
* Implement and automate security controls, governance processes, and compliance validation.
* Define and deploy monitoring, metrics, and logging systems on AWS.
* Be well versed in AWS, technology architecture, associated vendor products, and their interdependencies.
* Provide appropriate cloud solution recommendations based on your definition and analysis of the client's technical requirements while advising and leading the client to their Cloud adoption strategy.
* Learn and adopt new tools and techniques to increase performance, automation, and scalability.
* Share the leading practices and cloud emerging technologies with internal team members and clients.


Requirements
  
  

* Bachelor's in Software/Computer Engineering or Computer Science.
* Effective Communication skills (Proficiency in English Language).
* 2\\+ years project experience migrating and deploying cloud\\-based solutions (AWS).
* 2\\+ years of experience architecting, implementing, and supporting Amazon Web Services infrastructure and services.
* Self\\-driven, ability to work independently or as part of a project team with limited supervision.


Technical Experience/Expertise
  
  

* Project experience implementing core infrastructure, networking and cloud\\-based services for business teams or consumers.
* Automation experience with Cloud Formation Template, Terraform, Ansible and System Manager.
* Container configuration and implementation experience with Docker, Vagrant and Kubernetes.
* Experience working on Agile projects (Scrum or Kanban).


Deep product knowledge and understanding of product features including:
  
  

* IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS Solutions
* Kubernetes or EKS, Docker­­­
* Hybrid Cloud Solutions
* Automation and DevOps (Git, Jenkins, CLI, ARM, Terraform, Ansible, Puppet, Chef)


An understanding of cloud ecosystem and leading\\-edge cloud emerging technologies including:
  
  

* Configuring and tuning cloud hosted solutions and platforms.
* Supporting production applications or workloads in a cloud\\-based environment
* Performance analysis, troubleshooting and remediation techniques.
* Encryption and key management principles and design patterns
* Networking principles and technologies (DNS, Load Balancers, Reverse Proxies).
* Automation and DevOps principles
* Microsoft Active Directory and Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS).
* Single\\-sign\\-on (SSO) solutions including SAML and OAuth authentication options.
* High Availability and Disaster Recovery principles, patterns, and usage.
* Sizing hardware and storage needs.


Preferred Requirements
  
  

**AWS:** Certified Solutions Architect – Associate.

title: Cloud Operations Manager (AWS)
description:
Cloudelligent is looking for experienced candidates for the position of Cloud Manager (AWS)
  
  

**Position Title:** Cloud Manager (AWS)
  
  

**Location:** DHA Phase\\-II, Islamabad (Hybrid)
  
  

**Job Timings:** 8am\\-5pm Central Time (US)
  
  

About Cloudelligent
  
  

Cloudelligent is Cloud\\-native consultancy and AWS Advanced consulting partner! We specialize in providing bespoke cloud solutions to the SMB \\& enterprise segments as well as the public sector (Non\\-Profit Organizations). Being a next\\-gen cloud service provider, Cloudelligent helps small businesses \\& medium/large enterprises to break free from hardware lifecycle and capital expenditures, allowing them to make the most out of their cloud investment. We have an international footprint with a diverse team of domain experts, and we are customer obsessed.
  
  

Job Objective
  
  

As a Cloud Manager (AWS), you will report to the Principal Consultant, Cloud Services. You will oversee a team of engineers on the multicultural Cloud Operations team. You will lead your team in providing outstanding customer service for AWS Cloud Infrastructure, including optimization and configuration of customer AWS environments.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

* Lead team development, operational excellence, and communication.
* Establish a supportive environment for all team members.
* Work with the cloud team to operationalize service offerings and develop new service opportunities.
* Author re\\-usable Infrastructure\\-as\\-Code to provision complex, scalable AWS environments
* Modernize customer architecture through containerization using tools like Kubernetes, Docker, and ECS/EKS.
* Identify areas for cost savings through AutoScaling, right\\-sizing, and elimination of waste within the customer's AWS environments.
* Actively engage in pre\\-sales presentations to promote Cloud Operations service offerings.
* Lead the development of internal documentation and the creation of standardized runbooks.
* Assist and review estimates for customer implementations, schedules, and overall planning.
* Support problem management and client escalations; lead Post\\-Mortem Reviews for key incidents or globally recurring incidents.
* Observe and regulate customer handoffs from Sales to Cloud Operations and ensure successful customer onboardings.
* Provide ongoing operational guidance for engineers while working with clients.
* Guarantee customer satisfaction and resolution of all service tickets within defined SLAs.
* Manage and report team key performance indicators.
* Direct team members to obtain AWS and other needed certifications.


Requirements
  
  

* Bachelor's in software/computer engineering or computer science or related field.
* 5\\+ years of experience managing AWS cloud workloads or similar experience.
* 2\\+ years of technical team management or related experience with customer\\-facing teams.
* Knowledge of ITIL Concepts (Incident, Major Incident, Problem, and Change).
* Experience in a technical customer support role that included planning, coordinating, problem resolution, and documentation.
* Effective communication skills (proficiency in English language).
* Self\\-driven, ability to work independently or as part of a project team with limited supervision.


Good to have
  
  

* AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate
* AWS Certified SysOps Administrator Associate

title: Web Applications Developer
description:
### **Very Brief**


Are you a PHP Developer? And you think you are good at it, then we would like to hear from you at hr@areteapps.com


### **Brief**


We are looking for a talented software engineer with web applications experience to join our team. The candidate should have very good knowledge and experience in PHP development with a proven record. Extra knowledge of various technologies like java and .Net will be preferred. You will be involved in new products and new feature development. You will be involved in all phases of the software development lifecycle: requirement analysis, design, implementation, testing, and production support. You should have a professional attitude \\& capacity of working with a team of developers, seek new challenges and takes initiatives. As a PHP Developer/Programmer, you will be required to extensively work in PHP, MySQL, and AJAX/jQuery. You should possess good communication skills, work with minimal assistance and have the capacity of working in a team as well as independently.


### **Duties \\& Responsibilites**


The web application Developer will architect, develop and/or maintain a variety of open\\-source projects. You will be expected to plan, research, develop logic, code, test and deploy several Web projects with minimal assistance. You will work as a part of a cross\\-functional team including graphic design, front\\-end UI developers, search engine optimization specialists, and project managers. You must be quick and accurate, adaptable and flexible to meet changing priorities and timelines.


You will be performing the following duties.


* Create web application from mockups/layouts to fully functional deliverable.
* Design, evaluate, update and maintain structural and object oriented web applications in PHP.
* Translate client’s information into a functional application.
* Develop functional and technical specifications for projects.
	+ Determine all necessary coding requirements for the project/application.
	+ Scope and estimate development effort for specific jobs.
	+ Document the Analysis, Design and Development phases.
* Install, configure and develop web applications.
* Implement changes to existing applications/sites and update current information as directed by client.
* Assist the team with HTML emails, ad banners, and various digital media projects.
* Perform thorough QA testing including functional and cross\\-browser/platform compatibility.
  

  

***Other Responsibilities include:***


* Advising the executives on the necessities and information required for the project.
* Taking part in the preliminary planning of the project, meeting and discussing ideas related to it.
* Taking part in development of multimedia animations, and interactive presentations in Flash and other multimedia tools which are related to the project.
* Design and production of advertisements, postings, banners, flyers etc. (Web and print media) which are related to the project.

Responsible for any additional duties which may be assigned from time to time.


### **Required Skills**


***Required Skills in Brief:*** PHP / MySQL/HTML/XHTML/ CSS/JAVA SCRIPT/AJAX


We are looking for a web Developer with experience in open source technologies. You will be responsible for working on a number of projects at any one time using a complex range of technologies including PHP(LAMP), MySQL Server, JavaScript, HTML, XHTML, CSS and OpenSource. You should have experience of OOP, have good analytical and code\\-translation skills. You should know how to build a web application from the ground up, as well as modify and build on existing code. You should know PHP \\& mySQL like the back of your hand. Experience in developing CMS using Wordpress or joomla would be a major advantage.
  

Working Experience and/or knowledge of the following tools \\& technologies is a must:


* HTML Coding Including CSS Coding, Table Based and Table Less HTML Coding. Must have strong knowledge of HTML, XHTML, CSS and Photoshop with practical experience. Image/Design Slicing and conversion to XHTML. Knowledge of playing with DIV based HTML layouts. Expertise in Web 2\\.0\\. designs.
* Good command on JavaScript and frameworks like jQuery or prototype.
* Solid PHP development experience with OOP, Good analytical and code\\-translation skills.
* Must be a good Database engineer, Can work with or develop MySQL queries for complex scenarios. Should have hands on experience with joins and query analysis.
* Understand the MVC architecture and have worked with it in some technology.
* Strong web concepts. Knowledge of web services, and how to make it work with UI.

Knowledge (Working Experience) of opensource \\-CMS* \\- Systems (Wordpress / Joomla / Magento / Drupal/Zen Cart)
* Preferably worked with any PHP framework will be a plus (symphony/Cake\\-PHP/Code Ignitor/Zend/Symfony/Yii)
* Payment gateways PayPal, Authorize.net, Plimus , Google checkout ,Face book / Twitter apps
* Experience in web\\-based tools, including XML manipulation (both parsing and writing) and experience with XML based applications and protocols
* Web icons, images, and color schemes for use in browser based applications.

*Knowledge of following will be an Asset*  

PEAR library / Knowledge of SEO / Design Patterns / W3C Web standards / Facebook / Twitter / You Tube / LinkedIn / Orkut  

**Valued Skills**  

Experience/Knowledge of the following tools/technologies is desirable:


* Ruby, Ruby on Rails
* Java, JSP, Struts, Beans, Hibernate
* .Net
* Must possess creative and artistic abilities. Ability to do graphic designing :
* + Experience of Image Optimization techniques, Image croping, Static \\& Animated Banner AD Designing, Newsletter Designing.
	+ Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Flash CS (and Action Script),Flash XML based elements.
	+ Animation, Motion graphics and Video experience
* Social Media knowledge and online marketing
* Experience with Native and Web App Mobile Development
* Knowledge and experience with responsive design and “mobile first” strategies and techniques

**Interpersonal Skills**


* Fast learner, dynamic and self starter
* Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written)
* + Ability to communicate effectively with developers, managers, users and clients.
	+ Fluent written \\& spoken English with excellent communications skills
* Should be able to work independently and with team.
* Should be able to strictly follow specified time lines.
### **Required Experience \\& Qualification**


The assignment would require the person to be an avid user of online products and bring in high\\-level of design sensibility with the ability to produce a variety of creative solutions. Comfortable working in flexible situations. Ability to think creatively and crystallize ideas in design form. The candidate should be able to confidently, effectively and efficiently interact with clients and with the team.The candidate should have good Web Development skills with 1\\-2 years of experience in HTML, JavaScript/jQuery, PHP, MySQL. Excellent written, oral communication and presentation skills are necessary for the post.
  

Ideal candidate must be highly creative and have additional expertise in designing.


### **Additional Notes**


* Are you a web Developer who would like to crack into the Mobile space? If so, do write to us.
* Team Lead experiences always help you lead the way. We like people who do this.
* This is a fantastic opportunity for the right person to really develop and achieve further responsibilities within a short period of time.
* Within our start\\-up environment, you should be prepared to be flexible and help out in several cross\\-functional areas. The opportunity to grow, learn and contribute immeasurably is boundless.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date. A strong interest in technology and the ability to keep up with the latest trends and the concepts behind these trends is not a habit, it’s a necessity.
* How much we pay? It depends….. on you….. prove your worth….
### **Required Skills**

PHP 7/10
jQuery 6\\.5/10
mySql 5/10
HTML / CSS 7/10
WordPress 5/10
SEO 3\\.5/10
.Net 3/10

title: Internship - Software Engineering
description:
**Overview:**


Arkhitech is seeking talented fresh Software Engineers for internship, that enjoy building advanced internet applications, and designing great APIs. To qualify for the interview, you MUST have either 3\\.5\\+ GPA, OR highly sophisticated and professionally developed FYP, OR demonstration of sophisticated software engineering expertise and application outside of classroom, OR have datastructures, algorithms, and design patterns on your fingertips.


**Major Duties \\& Responsibilities:**


* Cultivating engineering best practices within the engineering group, and, in conjunction with senior engineers, company wide.
* Collaborating with technical leaders to analyze complex feature requests and suggest implementation strategies.
* Estimate the time required to complete the work and provide quotes.
* Performing moderately complex product design, systems analysis and programming activities requiring research.
* Conducting unit testing (including mocking as needed) and integration testing on software.
* Adhering to Arkhitech's policies, standards and procedures in the performance of job duties.
* Other duties as assigned.


**Qualifications:**


* Minimum Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science.
* Strong grasp over fundamental computer science concepts such as data structures, algorithms, time complexities, OOP, and MVC.
* Exposure to Agile development process and engineering best practices like continuous integration and unit testing is highly prefered.
* Excellent technical judgement to know when to use an off the shelf solution, and when to make a custome one.
* Good verbal and written communication and presentation skills.
* High energy level with strong motivation to meet delivery deadlines.


**Key Benefits:**


* Competitive salaries
* Daily catered lunches
* Accelerated career growth!
